discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Consistency help to ensure the effectiveness of AI models

questions.question_text:
A developer has a large amount of data, but it is scattered across different systems and is not standardized.

Which key data quality element should they focus on to ensure the effectiveness of the AI models?

choices.B: Review and update missing lead information.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Review and update missing lead information can help to achieve this goal

questions.question_text:
A sales manager is looking to enhance the quality of lead data in their CRM system.

Which process will most likely help the team accomplish this goal?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Ensures compliance with laws and regulations

Selected Answer: A
A. Ensures compliance with laws and regulations

questions.question_text: Why is it critical to consider privacy concerns when dealing with AI and CRM data?

choices.C: Increases the volume of data collected
choices.B: Confirms the data is accessible to all users
choices.A: Ensures compliance with laws and regulations
